Fresh Recruits.description: Add a new unit to your Order of Battle. Cost varies by unit Power Level.

Combat Revival.description: Return a destroyed unit to your Order of Battle with 1 Battle Scar.

Increase Supply Limit.description: Increase your Crusade force's Supply Limit by 10 PL (200 points).

Rearm and Resupply.description: Remove one Battle Scar from a unit in your Order of Battle.

Repair and Recuperate.description: Restore lost wounds or models to a unit. Cost varies by extent of repairs.

Specialist Reinforcements.description: Add one model to an existing unit (up to maximum unit size).

Weapon Modifications.description: Replace or upgrade a weapon on a unit. Cost varies by weapon type.

Equipment Upgrades.description: Add additional wargear or equipment to a unit.

Psychic Fortitudes.description: PSYKER CHARACTER units only. Gain additional psychic abilities.
